label: 玉葉
本: Jewel in the Ashes: Buddha Relics and Power in Early Medieval Japan . Harvard University Asia Center . 2000
説明文: Gyokuyō (J.) 玉葉, also referred to as 玉海 Gyokukai. This massive diary of Kujō Kanezane (1149-1207) covers the period from 1164 to 1200, and provides the most thorough depiction of political and social life of the late Heian and early Kamakura eras.
